attributes.action: to reduce the vat level to zero for all sporting activities/venues run by local councils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This government keeps on telling us we are fast becoming a unhealthy, obese nation yet still has the audacity to charge TAX @ 17.5% to use local council run sporting activities & venues.

Stop this disgusting immoral HEALTH TAX NOW.

Zero tax on sporting activities/venues

rejection.details: Your petition has already been posted http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nohealthtax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
